20101208223230.571|20101208223231.286|CCO|    
20101208223231.286|20101208223232.000|CCO|    that's caused by a clot,

20101208223233.429|20101208223234.143|CCO|    But PLAVIX helps save lives.
20101208223234.143|20101208223234.857|CCO|    
20101208223234.857|20101208223235.571|CCO|          PLAVIX, taken with
20101208223235.571|20101208223236.286|CCO|

20101208223237.000|20101208223237.714|CCO|

20101208223238.429|20101208223239.143|CCO|

20101208223239.857|20101208223240.571|CCO|  to provide greater protection
20101208223240.571|20101208223241.286|CCO|    
20101208223241.286|20101208223242.000|CCO|        against heart attack

20101208223244.857|20101208223245.571|CCO|

20101208223249.857|20101208223250.571|CCO|        Ask your doctor
20101208223250.571|20101208223251.286|CCO|
20101208223251.286|20101208223252.000|CCO|    if PLAVIX is right for you.
20101208223252.000|20101208223252.714|CCO|    
20101208223252.714|20101208223253.429|CCO|      Protection that helps
20101208223253.429|20101208223254.143|CCO|        
20101208223254.143|20101208223254.857|CCO|            save lives.
20101208223254.857|20101208223255.571|CCO|    
20101208223255.571|20101208223256.286|CCO|    Certain genetic factors

20101208223259.857|20101208223300.571|CCO|    leaving you at greater risk
20101208223300.571|20101208223301.286|CCO|
20101208223301.286|20101208223302.000|CCO|    for heart attack and stroke.

20101208223302.625|20101208223303.250|CCO|        Your doctor may use
20101208223303.250|20101208223303.875|CCO|

20101208223310.125|20101208223310.750|CCO|  People with stomach ulcers or
20101208223310.750|20101208223311.375|CCO|

20101208223312.000|20101208223312.556|CCO|
